label: ham
subject:
Rev 111: this is a demonstration of an idea for handling locks in
	ctdb. in http://samba.org/~tridge/ctdb
body: That we should take counsel about what has happened, and when the dice have been thrown order our affairs in the way which reason deems best; not, like children who have had a fall, keeping hold of the part struck and wasting time in setting up a howl, but always accustoming the soul forthwith to apply a remedy, raising up that which is sickly and fallen, banishing the cry of sorrow by the healing art.
